mapper.sql: em_id, em_name, em_phone, em_sex, em_post, em_address, dep_id, em_state, em_createtime, em_createuser
mapper.select:
select * from employ
em_phone like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by em_id
mapper.insert: insert into employ (em_id, em_name, em_phone, em_sex, em_post, em_address, dep_id, em_state, em_createtime, em_createuser) values (#{emId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{emCreateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER})

em_id,

mapper.update:
update employ
em_name = #{emName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
em_phone = #{emPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
em_sex = #{emSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
em_post = #{emPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
em_address = #{emAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
em_state = #{emState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
em_createtime = #{emCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
em_createuser = #{emCreateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where em_id = #{emId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employ set em_name = #{emName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, em_phone = #{emPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, em_sex = #{emSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, em_post = #{emPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, em_address = #{emAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, em_state = #{emState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, em_createtime = #{emCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, em_createuser = #{emCreateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where em_id = #{emId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
